Illustration / Anna Crichton

Ponsonby shooting: Police investigate whether revolver found in Lake Taupō was murder weapon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-shooting-police-investigate-whether-revolvers-found-in-lake-taupo-were-murder-weapon/L6EQI5GKGFHQXAGRSIZHWHXHDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-shooting-police-investigate-whether-revolvers-found-in-lake-taupo-were-murder-weapon/L6EQI5GKGFHQXAGRSIZHWHXHDE/ George Block, Jared SavageThey are cut-down Alfa Carbines, which have fast become the favoured gun for gang members. Police have now found two pistols they believe could have been used in the killing in Lake Taupo. Photo / Supplied

It just doesn’t want to. Sat, 15 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 National Party MP Tim Costley has been outed for taking the money to pay for his Wellington apartment when his family home is 58km up the road in Ōtaki.

10-year-old boy kicked off Latam flight for failing to follow safety instructions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/travel-news/10-year-old-boy-kicked-off-latam-flight-for-failing-to-follow-safety-instructions/UHPPOGO2OFHSZDV5X4ZFXTPDSA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/travel-news/10-year-old-boy-kicked-off-latam-flight-for-failing-to-follow-safety-instructions/UHPPOGO2OFHSZDV5X4ZFXTPDSA/ The captain ultimately had to move off the runway and return to the airport. Photos / Brett Phibbs, X @ElInformador_SM
